name: Hubspot
description: Send contact data to Hubspot on PostHog identify events.

config.hint: Can be acquired under Profile Preferences -> Integrations
config.name: Hubspot API Key

config.hint: A comma-separated list of PostHog events you want to trigger Contact creation in HubSpot. By default, we recommend using the $identify event.
config.name: Triggering events

config.hint: A mapping of additional PostHog event or person properties to map to newly created Hubspot Contacts. Provide a comma-separated mapping of: personPropertyName:hubSpotPropertyName
config.name: Additional PostHog to HubSpot property mappings

config.hint: A comma-separated list of email domains to ignore and not create contacts for in Hubspot.
config.name: Email domains to skip

config.hint: The PostHog instance URL you want Hubspot Scores synced into. Required to sync Hubspot contact scores into PostHog Persons.
config.name: Hubspot Score PostHog Instance

config.hint: If run in debug mode, run each minute and ignore cache. Do not use this in production, only for debugging
config.name: Debug Mode
